channel.title: Examine + Read
channel.description:
1. Is it possible to change what it says when you examins something? like Danger Sign says "Danger" is it possible to make it says something else
2. How do i make a menu pop up when someone clicks Read on a sign? like the direction signs on runescape south to varrock -- east to draynor..

item.title: Examine + Read
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Go into class8.java client side, find the ints for the item you want to change and change anything you want

Read full topic

2nd one is server side.
